ygData.subject: Re: Jewelcraft
ygData.msgSnippet: I have almost a complete list of trivials at my site: http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/jewellery/jewel_trivials.asp The high levels will get put in once i
ygData.messageBody:
I have almost a complete list of trivials at my site:

http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/jewellery/jewel_trivials.asp

The high levels will get put in once i finish it - but the highest I know of
is Gold Black Pearl at 196.

- Baels

----- Original Message -----
From: <eantravis@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 22, 1999 5:57 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelcraft


> From: eantravis@...
>
> That would be nice, but its not the case. At NO POINT does ANY platinum
> jewlery become trivial. My skill is 190 at the moment. At 191 gold and
Opal
> will become trivial, and that is that. No other metal - gem combination
> will be trivial after gold and Opal (Maybe gold and Ruby becomes trivial
at
> some point between 192 and 200, but I seriously doubt it). So get ready to
> fail alot when you hit 191 and level 34. Platinum jewelry is a pain in the
> ass, and it sure hurts the pocketbook when you fail...
>
> Timn the Enchanter
> "There are some who call me . . . Timn?"
>
>
> At 01:30 PM 11/21/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
> >
> >hey guys, small question about Jewelcraft
> >My skill is currently 153, i hear that 200 is Max?
> >does that mean at 200 skill, i can make anything? including all platinum
> >stuff?
> >
> >>
>
> >
